title: Is She An A*Hole For Choosing Food Over Her Boyfriend?
description:
Because of her boyfriend's serve food allergies, there's a list of foods she doesn't eat. But during her vacation, she ate everything she was restricted from. 48 hours before her return, she stopped eating the food out of consideration for her boyfriend. 
However he was still upset about the food she ate. So he gave her an ultimatum. Him or the food. 
Is she an a*hole for considering leaving him over this? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
